direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve accessing elements in the stack with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with the stack's elements, though pop removes elements while search only accesses them.
Both methods modify the state of the stack, though push adds elements while search does not.

enhanced_by.reason: Push is used to populate the stack with elements before performing a search.
Peek can be used to verify the state of the stack before and after the search operation.
Empty can be used to assert the state of the stack after the search operation.
